definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
crocodile tears/fig. hypocritical words of sympathy
with one's face covered in tears (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 ba3 yan3 lei4 yi1 ba3 bi2 ti4

sentences.english: Tears don't mean you're losing, everybody's bruising.
sentences.chinese: 眼泪并不意味着你失去了，大家的青肿。

sentences.english: Tears are sometimes rolling down from your cheek whenever thinking of the past painful hardship and hurting experience.
sentences.chinese: 每当想起过去痛苦与伤心，眼泪总是潸然流下。

sentences.english: They were moved to tears by his honesty.
sentences.chinese: 他们为他的诚实感动得落下了眼泪。

sentences.english: No longer would his darling’s candle be extinguished by his useless tears.
sentences.chinese: 宝贝女儿的蜡烛再也没有被他无用的眼泪熄灭过。

sentences.english: Your Petals season, can see my tears?
sentences.chinese: 你的落花时节，能否看到我的眼泪？

sentences.english: Don't cry, you know, no one will help you to wipe tears.
sentences.chinese: 不要流泪了，你要知道，没有人会帮你擦眼泪。

sentences.english: It's more than just words: it's just tears and rain.
sentences.chinese: 多说无益，就让眼泪和雨水来证明。

sentences.english: Tears have dried, but in the heart.
sentences.chinese: 眼泪已流干，心却在滴血。

sentences.english: Tears stream down my cheeks, still, I don't stop.
sentences.chinese: 眼泪仍然不断淌下脸颊，我却并未停步。

sentences.english: I heard him asking, tears streaming down on clang.
sentences.chinese: 我一听他这么问，眼泪哗的一下就流了下来。

sentences.english: A single tear ran down my cheek.
sentences.chinese: 一滴眼泪顺着我的脸颊流下来。

sentences.english: Show me that my tears have made my rainbows.
sentences.chinese: 求你使我看见我的眼泪是筑成虹彩的材料。

sentences.english: That wiped away tears for you, is the last person you spend.
sentences.chinese: 那个为你擦干眼泪的，才是最后和你相守的人。

sentences.english: The tears are just like raindrops.
sentences.chinese: 哗啦啦，小白云的眼泪像雨点。

sentences.english: The woman wiped away her tears and listened to Katyayana carefully.
sentences.chinese: 妇人把眼泪擦拭一下，望着迦旃延。
她眼泪扑簌簌地往下掉。

definition: to choke with emotion/to choke with sobs
